show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: All Together Now
content: 16 January —    CODEPINK’s Actions for Peace — Charlene Spretnak speaks with Medea Benjamin, cofounder of CODEPINK and… author of Drone Wars, about the group’s efforts regarding drone strikes; the upcoming Women Lead to Peace Summit in Switzerland (linked with the UN Geneva II Middle East Peace Talks); the pending US treaty with Iran; and the situation in Gaza [codepink.org]; “Ella’s Song” by Sweet Honey in the Rock
